Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 5 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)
Dilshan Madushanka took 4 wickets for 49 runs
Kasun Rajitha took 4 wickets for 50 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka's seamers did plenty of early damage
Post-Match Reflections: Sadeera Samarawickrama: 'Really happy to finish the game. We needed a win.'
Kusal Mendis: 'Very happy today. We did really well in everything.'
Scott Edwards: 'We didn't start well. We got ourselves to a pretty competitive total.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch started turning a bit towards the end of the match
Sri Lanka wasted a chance to improve net run rate by slowing down too much in late overs
